mapper.sql: select id, accounting_period, actuarial_code, business_code, product_name, term_type, insurance_main_type, insurance_sub_type, design_type, short_term_flag, reg_mid_id, guaranteed_cost_rate, sub_account, new_business_flag, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_del from t_base_product_attribute
mapper.select: where actuarial_code = #{actuarialCode} and accounting_period = #{accountingPeriod} and is_del = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into t_base_product_attribute
accounting_period, actuarial_code, business_code, product_name, term_type, insurance_main_type, insurance_sub_type, design_type, short_term_flag, reg_mid_id, guaranteed_cost_rate, sub_account, new_business_flag, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_del
#{accountingPeriod}, #{actuarialCode}, #{businessCode}, #{productName}, #{termType}, #{insuranceMainType}, #{insuranceSubType}, #{designType}, #{shortTermFlag}, #{regMidId}, #{guaranteedCostRate}, #{subAccount}, #{newBusinessFlag}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, 0
mapper.update: update t_base_product_attribute set is_del = 1 where id = #{id}

update t_base_product_attribute set is_del = 1 where id in

mapper.insert:
insert into t_base_product_attribute ( accounting_period, actuarial_code, business_code, product_name, term_type, insurance_main_type, insurance_sub_type, design_type, short_term_flag, reg_mid_id, guaranteed_cost_rate, sub_account, new_business_flag, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_del ) values
